entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Flurries ending early this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 15 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Flurries at times heavy beginning in the afternoon. Risk of snow squalls late in the afternoon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 40 gusting to 60 early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 06:17 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
